[CDF-25204] ðŸ“Š Dump streamlit apps (#1895)

# Description

Adds support for dumping streamlit apps. This is typically used by users
that creates a streamlit app using the fusion UI in a dev CDF project,
and then, dumping it, enables the user to add it to governance in a prod
CDF project.

<img width="963" height="138" alt="image"
src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/0acd3d4b-3f16-44e0-93f7-cebb8b72c766"
/>


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] Support for dumping streamlit apps, `cdf dump streamlit`. 

## templates

No changes.
